channel.title: Posts on Aditi Shenoy
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Aditi Shenoy

item.title: CASP 15 Day-1 Review
item.description: Expanding criteria for review John Moult proposes a way to add evaluation criteria (e.g. reproducibility, robustness, training bias, suitability for benchmarking) for method-based and application-based papers.

item.title: Installing Nvidia Driver and Cuda in a Singularity Container
item.description: Installing Nvidia Drivers and Cuda on a Linux machine can be a tricky affair. Though it is possible to install both the nvidia-driver and the nvidia-cuda-toolkit using a package manager, it could result in incompatibile versions and could potentially break the graphics or operating system.

item.title: “Wi-Fi: No Hardware Installed“ - What to do?
item.description: Over the past couple of weeks I had been getting an error with the Wi-fi on my Macbook Air (2017). There was an ‘x’ in the Wi-fi symbol and on clicking the icon, the message read “Wi-Fi: No Hardware Installed”.

item.title: Could these global health problems soon become your problems?
item.description: Across the world, technologies are being increasingly used to maximize productivity in the clinical space. Being a part of this change and learning to adapt to it would be of utmost importance in the coming years with the pressing challenges of the current healthcare systems in the world.
